Uses of Class
gametools.Sprite

    • Uses of Sprite in gametools

      Methods in gametools that return Sprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sprite SpriteGroup.get(int i)
      Returns a single sprite from the group at the specified reference.
      Sprite SpriteGroup.getFirstWithin(Area obj)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the specified object.
      Sprite SpriteGroup.getFirstWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the object using the specified collision method.
      Methods in gametools that return types with arguments of type Sprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAll() 
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAllWithin(Area obj)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new array list.
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAllWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Sprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SpriteGroup.add(Sprite sprite)
      Adds a sprite to the end of the group.
      void SpriteGroup.remove(Sprite sprite)
      Removes the specified sprite from the group.
      Method parameters in gametools with type arguments of type Sprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SpriteGroup.addAll(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
      Adds all the passed in elements to the group.
      void SpriteGroup.removeAll(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
      Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
      Constructors in gametools with parameters of type Sprite 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(Sprite sprite) 
      Constructor parameters in gametools with type arguments of type Sprite 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteGroup(java.util.List<Sprite> elements)
      Creates a sprite group and fills it with the passed in sprites.
